attributes.action: Allow the carrying of the Union Flag at public events.
attributes.additional_details: The Durham Miners Gala on the 14th July 2018. People were made to leave the event for flying the Union Flag.
attributes.background: People have been stopped from displaying the Union Flag at public events. The latest being the Durham Miners Gala where they were forced to leace the city.

rejection.details:
People are already allowed to carry the Union Flag, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

you can find out more about the rules on flying flags here:

https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/15438/flying_flags_guide.pdf
